app.network_error_desc: This DApp only supports BSC Testnet.

home.welcome_subtitle: A decentralized platform supporting presale, tax mechanics and LP rewards

features.presale_desc: Whitelist presale with address quota. Only whitelisted users can buy during presale.
features.tax_desc: Automatic buy/sell taxes: Rewards (LP), Burn (destroy), Marketing (team).
features.lp_desc: LP holders can claim BNB rewards from the reward pool proportional to their LP.

swap.connect_first_desc: Connect your wallet to swap tokens
swap.title: Token Swap
swap.subtitle: Seamlessly swap between tBNB and TAX tokens
swap.chart_notice_desc: This is simulated price data for demonstration purposes only. Actual prices should be referenced from on-chain real-time data.
swap.trading_not_started_desc: Token trading has not been enabled yet. Price chart is unavailable.
swap.collecting_price_data_desc: Price data is being collected. Chart will be displayed once sufficient data is available.
swap.real_time_data_desc: Showing {{count}} price data points for the past {{range}}, updated every 30 seconds.

features.instant_desc: Fast, secure token swaps powered by PancakeSwap
features.low_fees_desc: Minimal transaction fees on BSC network

info.title: How it works
info.step1: Connect your wallet to the BSC network
info.step2: Select tokens and enter the amount to swap
info.step4: Confirm the swap and wait for confirmation

presale.connect_first_desc: Connect your wallet to participate in the presale
presale.title: Token Presale
presale.not_in_whitelist_title: You are not in the presale whitelist
presale.not_in_whitelist_desc: Please contact the admin to add your address to the whitelist
presale.not_started_title: Presale not started or has ended
presale.not_started_desc: Please wait for the admin to start the presale or visit other pages
presale.guide_1: Only whitelisted addresses can buy during the presale
presale.guide_2: Each address has its own purchase quota
presale.guide_3: Presale proceeds go to the marketing wallet
presale.guide_4: After presale, admin will add liquidity and enable trading

errors.enter_valid_bnb: Please enter a valid BNB amount

rewards.connect_first_desc: Connect your wallet to view and claim LP rewards
rewards.title: LP Holder Rewards
rewards.subtitle: BNB rewards for liquidity providers
rewards.tip: Rewards come from trading taxes. When accumulated reward tokens reach the threshold, they are sold for BNB. LP holders can claim proportionally.
rewards.no_rewards_tip: No rewards available yet. Please wait for distribution.
rewards.howto_1_desc: Reward tax accumulates in the contract. When it reaches threshold (500k tokens), it is sold for BNB.
rewards.howto_2_desc: BNB stays in the contract; LP holders can claim proportional to their LP tokens.
rewards.howto_3_desc: Add liquidity for TAX/BNB on PancakeSwap to receive LP tokens.
rewards.howto_4_desc: Claim anytime. Consider claiming larger amounts to save gas.
rewards.no_lp_desc: Add liquidity for TAX/BNB on PancakeSwap to start earning
rewards.go_add_liquidity: Go to PancakeSwap to add liquidity

admin.connect_first_desc: Connect your wallet to view admin features
admin.no_permission_desc: Only the contract owner can access the admin panel
admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.subtitle: Contract management and configuration
admin.security_1: • Verify parameters. Total tax must not exceed 25%
admin.security_2: • Trading cannot be disabled once enabled. Ensure presale and liquidity are done
admin.security_3: • Admin actions cost gas. Prefer low gas times
admin.security_4: • Keep admin keys safe. Prefer multisig for contract ownership
